channel.title: Adding Custom Armor / Weapons
channel.description: Anyone.. What sprite number do you set in the itemswieldable for new items? I added a new 2h and full set of armor into the EasyRSC source. Each item has it's own sprite number (not the ID number) iron 2h is 49 steel is 50 mith 51 add 52 rune 53 black 54 and the dragon 2h is 239. The last sprite number is wieldable is 252 so i tried 253 and it puts on dragon plate lol i tried a load of combos.

item.title: Adding Custom Armor / Weapons
item.dc:creator: @ecstacy ecstacy
item.description:
@ecstacy wrote:

I’m pretty sure you just edit the picturemask. And you might have to make new sprites for your custom stuff.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Custom Armor / Weapons
item.dc:creator: @Lights_Out Lights Out
item.description:
@Lights_Out wrote:

cool link bro…

Anyone… What sprite number do you set in the itemswieldable for new items?
I added a new 2h and full set of armor into the EasyRSC source. Each item has it’s own sprite number (not the ID number)
iron 2h is 49 steel is 50 mith 51 add 52 rune 53 black 54 and the dragon 2h is 239.
The last sprite number is wieldable is 252 so i tried 253 and it puts on dragon plate lol i tried a load of combos.
